nodes.text: The Senate Apartment Complex was a luxurious apartment building located in the Senate District, on Coruscant. Senator Padmé Amidala of Naboo maintained a penthouse suite in this complex.

The Senate Apartment Complex was but a short distance from the Senate Building, and thus a prime location for the more popular and influential politicians in the Galactic Republic. The uppermost levels of the apartment building were given over to the Naboo Delegation with the election of Senator Amidala after the Battle of Naboo. Senator Simon Greyshade of the Vorzyd sector was also thought to have kept an apartment in this residence; his Narglatch XJ-6 airspeeder was often seen parked in the complex's mid-level speeder dock.
Toward the end of the Clone Wars, it was the meeting place of the Delegation of 2000.
